blog.name: bokunoheroacademialove
blog.title: Plus Ultra Headcanons!
blog.description: Sup! I'm Pheo (she/her) and I write oneshots/drabbles/headcanons for BNHA/MHA!  Please check my rules before submitting! REQUESTS ARE OPEN Masterlist

summary: HELLO!!! IM VERY EXCITED ABOUT THIS BLOG AND WOULD LIKE (1) ONE ORDER OF SOFT SHIGARAKI HCs THANK YOU!!!!!! ♡♡♡♡
question: HELLO!!! IM VERY EXCITED ABOUT THIS BLOG AND WOULD LIKE (1) ONE ORDER OF SOFT SHIGARAKI HCs THANK YOU!!!!!! ♡♡♡♡
answer:
HNNGHHH YESSS

Shigaraki 

🎮Okay, the first time you show this boy affection he’s going to be bewildered about it for days. He’ll probably flinch away and, quite honestly, ask, “what the fuck are you doing?” with wide eyes. Part of him wants to threaten to murder you but then his heart is doing this weird ass thing and his hands kinda feel like jelly and…maybe that was nice?

🎮Once he gets accustomed to being cuddled he’s such a brat about it. He wants you to constantly be touching him at the hideout in some way and will borderline throw fits if you don’t. Obviously he matures with time, but Shigaraki is still such a kid I cannot express that enough.

🎮Oh, I’m sorry, did…did you just gently touch his hand? Without flinching and looking terrified as you did it? Oh lord he’s gonna have a heart attack damn can’t believe you just murdered him like that.

      🎮Depending on the situation and if he was able to predict that’s where you were going to gently brush your hand against he won’t flinch and will probably just stare at you. Whether it’s creepy or endearing is up to you, but honestly he is just kinda…awe struck, or maybe possibly thinks you’re stupid, but…his heart’s doing that thing again and he’s panicking.

🎮He gets really lonely without you. He’ll never say it, but it’s so obvious and plain to see. Aside from Kurogiri you were about the only person he could actually talk to, and besides, if you managed to stick around long enough you would both be way closer than that. He’d just kinda seem lost, shuffling around, not entirely sure on what to be doing. Dare say it, you might’ve been his player 2. That’s right, not an NPC, not some team member to be sacrificed, his partner in crime.

🎮You can’t hold hands for obvious reasons, but he will always be holding your pinky. Before you his hands were nothing more than a grim reminder of past events and weapons, but having the chance to feel your skin against his, even if it’s just on one finger, while you grin brightly as he does so makes his chest tighten. 

🎮Whenever you kiss him he always has and will always continue to just get really quiet for a moment. You never really question it or ask why, but Shigaraki genuinely just can’t get used to such a sign of affection. He was deprived of it for his entire life, and suddenly there’s you there, showering him with it. He can’t wrap his head around it. Why were you so nice to him? With zero ulterior motives? 

🎮He won’t let anything happen to you, ever. You’re his Player 2, and you’re both supposed to work together, right? That can’t happen if you’re gone. Or at least that’s what he says to cover the fact he’s utterly infatuated by you and doesn’t know how he’d function if you were ripped out of his life. (murder)

blog.name: lovetododeku
blog.title: Tododeku
blog.description: This is my Tododeku sideblog, with a side of kiribaku. My ao3 is Indrel and my askbox is always open!

title: Preview of chapter 8
body:
I had a major assignment due today for university and I didn’t find the time to edit chapter 8 of Symbol of Love. Because of this I won’t release chapter 8 today as i normally would. Hopefully I will be able to release it tomorrow or at the latest on sunday. To make up for it I’ve decided to give you a preview of the chapter.

The yellow light - All Might’s light - flashed in his eye and a sense of wrongness poured from it. The feelings it usually evoked - adoration and worship, strength and protectiveness, determination and stubbornness - disappeared beneath an avalanche of fear. An overwhelming urge to get to All Might’s side and protect him overpowered Izuku. Somehow he knew All Might was in danger.

I have to get to him. Protect him, protect him, protect him! The yellow light began growing and swallowed the darkness in its path. The two other lights paled next to its brightness. The pounding of his heart reverberating like thunder in his ears and the barely healed wounds on his body burning as if the fire still kissed them.

As suddenly as it happened the feeling disappeared. Izuku blinked in confusion as the yellow light returned to its normal size and brightness in a heartbeat. The feeling of danger was gone just as suddenly and the need to get to All Might disappeared with it. The change almost gave him whiplash.

Kacchan was still talking as if nothing had happened and it appeared that only seconds had passed. If it hadn’t been for the pounding headache behind his right eye and the vivid memory Izuku would have doubted it happened at all.

Because why would All Might of all people need protection? And even if he had indeed been in danger what could possible Izuku do to help him? Maybe he could teleport to him … No, All Might had said Izuku couldn’t just teleport to heroes whenever and he had promised he wouldn’t. He always kept his promises.

summary: Jirou: I can’t sleep. Kaminari: You know, when you can’t sleep that means your soul mate is thinking about you! Jirou: Well my...
body:
Jirou: I can’t sleep.

Kaminari: You know, when you can’t sleep that means your soul mate is thinking about you!

Jirou: Well my soul mate needs to go the fuck to sleep.

question: do the iida brothers headcanons
answer:
It’s been I while since I got this ask sorry for taking so long :)

  • They have a secret hand code that Tensei used to use to show Tenya that he was safe after particularly dangerous villain run ins. He would always make the signal in front of the cameras to reassure Tenya.
  • After the Stain attack Tensei ended up in a wheel chair and when Tenya visits him the two of them goof around by using Tenya’s recipro burst to rocket around their neighborhood.
  • When Tensei met Uraraka and Midoriya for the first time he thought for sure one of them was dating Tenya so he kept trying to figure out which one. His method of investigation was…. embarrassing.
  • Tensei used to purposely embarrass Tenya by doing the Naruto run in public.

body:
LOV Theory time

Okay, simply put - The League of Villains are the underdogs of the villain world, yet the biggest threat to the underdogs of the hero world.

Now let me elaborate. This current LOV arc is giving us insight on each of these Villains we’ve come to love over the last 200+ chapters. However, there had actually been very little background detail on these characters. Shigaraki and Twice were the two we knew the most about, and even then it wasn’t as much as we acted like it was. Horikoshi wouldn’t be doing an entire arc that frames the LOV as the Heros if he didn’t have a huge overall plot reason.

The new guys (whatever they’re called) are far more organized and more powerful than the LOV. By most standards, they are the superior villain group. The whole yakuza Villains were also far more organized and advanced than the LOV. The more villain groups we meet, the more we see the LOV pale in comparison. Yet, the LOV are the central villain group. Why is this? Why is there an entire main villain group instead of just All for One and Shigaraki? Each of the members of LOV could have easily been introduced as one off Villains. But they aren’t. They are shown as a league.

A big part of Bnha is the relationships/dynamics between character and then also the hero society they live in. Class 1A is a league of their own, we see all the time the lasting relationships Deku builds. The dynamics that make the whole series. It’s important. Because relationship dynamics are the classic trope of what makes a hero so strong. If someone has the ability to care for others, has something worth losing, it makes them stronger. So - Hori has made it so that the main Villains also experience this.

This is a group of characters who are hated by the Bnha society. Be it that their quirk isn’t strong enough of their quirk isn’t socially acceptable, society hates them. Thus they hate society, as it’s society that took everything away from them. Then as they found each other, they found people that can be themselves with. A group that accepts them, even if society doesn’t. The LOV is joked to be a League of Friendship, and that’s not very far off. We see Twice getting over his trauma to save Toga, someone who means a lot to him. We see him go to save everyone, all who he considers friends. There’s that one guy who is like the mom of the group, there’s been a multitude of times where they save each other. Saving being something not associated with evil. The LOV may be the underdogs to other Villains, but it’s because they are the heros of their own story. I have a theory that one day Shigaraki will stand up to All for One, and then truly become the real villain of the story. But he’ll be able to do it because he has the LOV backing him up. All for One is NOT protected by the league of friendship dynamics, in fact, he’s also the villain to their storyline.

This current story arc is slowly confirming this theory of mine, and when they defeat this new group who’s goal is to exaggerate the parts of society that has demonized/ostracized them, it’ll prove exactly what I’m fearing.

So in summation of this haphazard theory, I think the LOV will be the ones to take down All for One, and then become a far worse final villain for Deku and Co. They may be the underdogs of the world, but they are heros of their side of the story.

Because in the end, there is nothing scarier than a Villain who does have something to lose.

body:
Me: just reveal Dabi is Touya already Horikoshi

Horikoshi: next I’m going to hint that he had an abusive father, then 10 chapters later it will be revealed that his abusive father was a Pro Hero, The Arc after that Dabi will say he has two brothers and a sister, this will all lead up to Dabi finally admitting that his first and last name starts with the letter T
